name: ConsiderReadonlyProperties
description: Consider using 'readonly' for properties that are initialized once in the constructor and not modified afterward (PHP 8.1+).

name: UseConstructorPropertyPromotion
description: Prefer constructor property promotion for cleaner and more concise constructor definitions (PHP 8.0+).

name: PreferMatchExpression
description: Consider using the 'match' expression over traditional 'switch' statements for simpler comparisons (PHP 8.0+).

name: PreferNullsafeOperator
description: Use the nullsafe operator (?->) for chained method calls on potentially null objects (PHP 8.0+).

name: UseUnionTypes
description: Prefer using Union Types for parameters and return types where a value can be one of several types (PHP 8.0+).

name: PreferEnums
description: Consider using Enums instead of class constants or string literals for a fixed set of distinct values (PHP 8.1+).
